metadata.description: Katie has gone missing. And Dr. Johann Averys, an internationally renowned demonologist, is determined to find her! PARANORMAL ACTIVITY didn't stop on the final frame of the movie - in fact, the story is just beginning! Based on the film Paranormal Activity, written & directed by Oren Peli, produced by Oren Peli and Jason Blum, and executive produced by Steven Schneider.
metadata.name: Paranormal Activity: The Search for Katie
